author: Simon Difford
description: A vodka charged lemonade with blue curaçao providing both the "electric" blue colour and orange notes.The more blue curaçao you add the more electric this drink. I'd go easy and drizzle 15ml max to add a blue bleed (as illustrated).
name: Electric Lemonade
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with lemon-lime soda and FLOAT blue curaçao on top of drink (this will sink and bleed through drink)
